TopicTitle: can someone give me a link to mod/addons site?

Articles.Content: hello i am vgranmorken and i am new. i just wonder where do i find mods/addons?

There\'s a 'Projects and Releases' board in the 'Addon Making' section, where you can find all the addons that people have put up for download. There are some sites dedicated to KSP mods, although they won\'t have everything (and you\'d find links to them in threads on the 'Projects and Releases' board).
